text: wa-ib'talu l-yatama hatta idha balaghu l-nikaha fa-in anastum min'hum rush'dan fa-id'faʿu ilayhim amwalahum wala takuluha is'rafan wabidaran an yakbaru waman kana ghaniyyan falyastaʿfif waman kana faqiran falyakul bil-maʿrufi fa-idha dafaʿtum ilayhim amwalahum fa-ashhidu ʿalayhim wakafa bil-lahi hasiban
